BALL::MoleculePredicate

BALL::MoleculePredicate Class Reference

#include <BALL/KERNEL/standardPredicates.h>

Inheritance diagram for BALL::MoleculePredicate:

List of all members.


Public Member Functions

virtual bool operator() (const Atom &atom) const

Detailed Description

Predicate for matching molecules. Returns true, if the atom belongs to the molecule defined by the expression of this predicate.

Member Function Documentation

virtual bool BALL::MoleculePredicate::operator() ( const Atom &  atom  )  const [virtual]

Evaluate the predicate for the atom atom.

Parameters:
atom the atom to test
Returns:
true, if the predicate is true, false otherwise
